document.full_text: petrofac  chairman rodney chase, ex-corus chairman jim leng and former enterprise oil chairman graham hearne are expected to be asked to join the board of a new energy investment fund being set-up by tony hayward, the sunday times said.
document.title: ex-bp boss eyes trio for new investment fund: report
lines_and_colors: petrofac  chairman rodney chase, ex-corus chairman jim leng and former enterprise oil chairman graham hearne are expected to be asked to join the board of a new energy investment fund being set-up by tony hayward, the sunday times said.
